name: Body Bounce Rhythm
description: Master rhythmic bouncing techniques to stay in sync with high-energy rave beats.

cards.title: Basic Bounce Step
cards.description: A continuous up-and-down motion that helps maintain a fluid groove.
bulletpoints: Keep knees soft to absorb movement
Bounce in time with the beat
Use slight weight shifts for variations
cards.summaryText: Ride the beat with springy knees and gentle shifts to stay locked in.

cards.title: Dynamic Bounce Variations
cards.description: Add intensity and foot patterns to the bounce for a unique freestyle style.
cards.summaryText: Layer hops and accents on the bounce to dial up freestyle energy.
